txt.en: 'This is the last that we will stand from them!  It's been weeks since our enemies started to reinforce their positions. They should have had the sense to stay at home where they would be safe for a few days longer.\n\n'They add one or two at a time, to keep our suspicions at bay, but we are sick of their games. Strike at them! Tear them from this place... then we will march on to their next refuge!'
'Ha! Well done! That will teach those meddlesome fools to stand in our way!'
The Free Peoples are blocking the flow of troops to the south-east.
The Free Peoples' guards can be found at their encampments throughout the Ettenmoors, mostly to the south-east.\n\nForzunk instructed you to defeat the Free Peoples' guards.
Forzunk is at Gramsfoot.\n\nYou should tell Forzunk of your victories against the soldiers of the Coldfells.
